Direct Known Subclasses:
Agent
public abstract class AbstractAgent
extends java.lang.Object

Agent abstraction; every agent has to implement those methods

Constructor

Parameters:
x - current position of the agent on axis X

wLength - length of the floor
wWidth - width of the floor
visType - type of visibility (MyCell, MyNeighboor, All)
